Mmk, it didn’t help too much :. Thanks for not saying “Use the search bar” for once too. Cause that’s getting really fucking old

It’ll stay the same, you might as well get used to it.

Edit: Regarding your question…it would be pretty close to something like this:

[code]case 1:
code
break;

case 2: // option 2, similar to NPC dialogue yes?
code
break;[/code]

item.title: How to make a portal give options?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

I’m not asking you to do it for me, but can someone point me in the right direction?

		if ((objectID == 7319) && (objectX == 3218) && (objectY == 3218)) {
		teleEffect = 3;
		sendQuest("Green Dragons", 2470);
		sendQuest("Clan Pking", 2471);
		sendQuest("Edgeville", 2472);
		sendQuest("Magebank", 2473);
		sendFrame164(2469);
		}

Now, what do I need to add to make those go to the correct places?

Read full topic
